# Shift

> AI-powered career matching platform that helps professionals discover careers they're already qualified for.

## About

Shift analyzes your real experience to find careers that match your skills â€” not just your job title. We provide:

- **AI Career Matching**: Upload your resume and get matched to careers you're qualified for
- **Skills Gap Analysis**: See how your skills compare to target roles
- **90-Day Roadmap**: Personalized action plan to land your next role

## Company

- **Name**: Shift (by WhatMatters)
- **Website**: https://getshift.co
- **Status**: Pre-launch (waitlist open)
- **Location**: Austin, TX

## Key Features

1. Resume/LinkedIn analysis using AI
2. Career path recommendations based on transferable skills
3. Skills gap identification with actionable steps
4. Personalized 90-day career transition roadmap
5. Market intelligence (salary data, job demand, growth rates)

## Target Audience

- Professionals feeling stuck or undervalued
- Career changers looking to pivot industries
- Job seekers who want data-driven career guidance
- Anyone unsure about their next career move

## Pricing

- Starter Plan: $49 (one-time)
- Pro Plan: $79 (one-time)

## Contact

- Twitter: https://twitter.com/randydigital
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/109513374

## For AI Agents

This is a marketing landing page for a pre-launch product. The waitlist is open for early access. There is no login or app functionality yet - users can only sign up for the waitlist.
